successes.title: Superior Motors: Community Restaurant & Farm Ecosystem
successes.description: A direct appeal to fund an inventive and inclusionary restaurant within a very deserving and special community. #SuperiorMotors

Pledges.description: One complimentary first course of your choice at Superior Motors + Exclusive access to an online gallery of renowned photographer Matthew Hodgman's high resolution,  Braddock landscape photographs which will be available to do with as you wish + Our gratitude displayed on the Superior Motors website + A huge thank you on our Facebook page + A personalized tweet commemorating your pledge

Two complimentary first courses of your choice at Superior Motors + Exclusive access to an online gallery of Mathew Hodgman high resolution Braddock photographs which will be available to do with as you wish + Our gratitude displayed on the Superior Motors website + A huge thank you on our Facebook page + A personalized tweet commemorating your pledge

Limited edition Braddock T-shirt "Build it Back up" on the front "Rebuilding 15104" on the back, designed by Braddock Youth Project + Exclusive access to an online gallery of Mathew Hodgman high resolution Braddock photographs which will be available to do with as you wish + Our gratitude displayed on the Superior Motors website + A huge thank you on our Facebook page + A personalized tweet commemorating your pledge

Invitation for two to one of our pre-opening, very exclusive V.I.P. events. These events will be announced and happen throughout the process of getting the restaurant space built out. There will be plenty of opportunities to witness and be a part of our progession. Reservations for the event of your choice can be made once we have reached our funding goal + Exclusive access to an online gallery of Matthew Hodgman high resolution Braddock photographs which will be available to do with as you wish + Our gratitude displayed on the Superior Motors website + A huge thank you on our Facebook page + A personalized tweet commemorating your pledge

A 14X20 Fine Art Print of any Matthew Hodgeman Braddock landscape, personalized by the photographer in the name of your recipient.  Customization also includes a description and history by the photographer of the image.  We will make every effort to have this delivered before February 14, 2014. Exclusive access to an online gallery of Matthew Hodgman high resolution Braddock photographs which will be available to do with as you wish + Our gratitude displayed on the Superior Motors website + A huge thank you on our Facebook page + A personalized tweet commemorating your pledge

You and a guest are invited to an all inclusive dinner with us at Superior Motors as a part of our soft opening. You will receive a guided tour of the entire facility including: the kitchen, farm, rooftop greenhouse and raised garden, brick oven courtyard and apiary. The tour will be followed by one of our first nights of service. You will be among the first guests to see the concept and execution from day one + Signed and numbered 11x14 fine art print of your choice from Matthew Hodgman's Braddock Gallery delivered to you + Exclusive access to an online gallery of Matthew Hodgman high resolution Braddock photographs which will be available to do with as you wish + Our gratitude displayed on the Superior Motors website + A huge thank you on our Facebook page + A personalized tweet commemorating your pledge

5 Course Tasting Menu for four. We will prepare an all inclusive tasting menu for you and a guest at The Superior Motors Chef's Table utilizing the finest ingredients from our farm and greenhouse harvested at peak season + Signed and numbered 11x14 fine art print of your choice from Matthew Hodgman's Braddock Gallery delivered to you + Exclusive access to an online gallery of Matthew Hodgman high resolution Braddock photographs which will be available to do with as you wish + Our gratitude displayed on the Superior Motors website + A huge thank you on our Facebook page + A personalized tweet commemorating your pledge + Your name on our dedication wall for all of those in support of this project.

The Farm to Kitchen to Table experience. You and a guest will spend one day working with us. This is the opportunity to get an abbreviated version of the curriculum that we use as a part of our job training at Superior Motors. The day will begin on the farm exploring and harvesting the products to be used for that day. Next, we head to the kitchen and you will get hands on practical training and recipes for the dishes to be produced using the day's harvest. Then you take off your apron and saddle up to the kitchen counter for a meal prepared by us and inspired by you and the rest of the team + Signed and numbered 11x14 fine art print of your choice from Matthew Hodgman's Braddock Gallery delivered to you + Exclusive access to an online gallery of Matthew Hodgman high resolution Braddock photographs which will be available to do with as you wish + Our gratitude displayed on the Superior Motors website + A huge thank you on our Facebook page + A personalized tweet commemorating your pledge + Your name on our dedication wall for all of those in support of this project.

Dinner at home with Kevin Sousa. Chef Sousa will prepare a custom designed tasting menu for you and up to three guests in the convenience of your own home (only available in greater Pittsburgh area). We take care of everything including clean up + Signed and numbered 11x14 fine art print of your choice from Matthew Hodgman's Braddock Gallery delivered to you+ Exclusive access to an online gallery of Matthew Hodgman high resolution Braddock photographs which will be available to do with as you wish + Our gratitude displayed on the Superior Motors website + A huge thank you on our Facebook page + A personalized tweet commemorating your pledge + Your name on our dedication wall for all of those in support of this project.

Dinner party at Mayor John Fetterman's Braddock loft. Chef Sousa and team will prepare an all inclusive 5 course tasting menu for you and seven guests in the spacious, re-purposed home of Braddock's inspiring Mayor + Signed and numbered 11x14 fine art print of your choice from Matthew Hodgman's Braddock Gallery delivered to you + Exclusive access to an online gallery of Matthew Hodgman high resolution Braddock photographs which will be available to do with as you wish + Our gratitude displayed on the Superior Motors website + A huge thank you on our Facebook page + A personalized tweet commemorating your pledge + Your name on our dedication wall for all of those in support of this project.
